channel.title: Making more then 1 teleport [PI]

item.title: Making more then 1 teleport [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Illadelph, post:1, topic:473102”]Ok well im trying to make it so when you click on these name it teleports you… currently it just does nothing… the thing is in most cases you would just add c.getPA().startTeleport(2662, 3307, 0, "modern"); But since my code has more then one tele how do i add it? this is my current code

case 6005:
c.getDH().sendOption5(“Skills”, “Runecraft”, “Slayer”, “Fishing”, “Agility”);
c.teleAction = 6;
break;

How can i make it teleport to the proper location.[/quote]
You need to use dialogue actions to make sure the cases know what one you are using.

Read full topic

item.title: Making more then 1 teleport [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Illadelph Illadelph
item.description:
